attributes.action: Reject the Legal Services Commissions proposals to abolish legal aid support for family assessment centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed changes will put the lives of the most vulnerable children in our country at risk  The monetary saving is the equivalent to half a mile of motorway to the legal aid budget but the cost to the social services wil be at least five hospitals.  Many children are at risk of abuse neglect, torture or death.  Innocent loving families may also be torn apart.The centres will be forced to close and valuable expertise lost for ever  I have sent you a detailed email.

I urge you to reject the proposals
